ocean.question: I have a shell and move very slowly. What am I?

hints.text: 🐌 I carry my home on my back.
🥬 I like to eat plants.
🏖️ You can find me near the shore.

ocean.question: I'm a large body of salty water. What am I?

hints.text: 🚢 Boats sail on me.
🐟 Many animals live in me.
💧 I cover most of the Earth.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🔵 I can change color.
🧠 I am very smart.
🐙 I don't have bones.

ocean.question: I am a very large mammal that lives in the ocean and spouts water from my blowhole. What am I?

hints.text: 🎶 Some of my kind sing songs.
🐳 I am bigger than a car.
💧 I breathe air, but live in the ocean.

ocean.question: I'm a colorful fish that lives in coral reefs. What am I?

hints.text: 🐠 I often swim in schools.
🏠 I live in a colorful neighborhood of coral.
🌈 I come in many bright colors and patterns.

ocean.question: I am a large, flat fish that hides in the sand. Sometimes I have a barb on my tail. What am I?

hints.text: ⚫️ I am good at camouflage.
⚠️ Some kinds are dangerous.
🌊 I swim by flapping my 'wings'.

ocean.question: I am a current driven by differences in water density, temperature, and salinity. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I am found in deep ocean waters.
🌡️ I help regulate the Earth's climate.
🌍 I am a continuous flow of seawater.

ocean.question: I am a very tiny plant-like organism that floats in the ocean and is a food source for many animals. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I need sunlight to live.
🔍 You need a microscope to see me.
🐡 Many marine animals depend on me for food.

ocean.question: I am the deepest part of the ocean, a very dark and mysterious place. What am I?

hints.text: 🌑 Sunlight doesn't reach me.
Pressure is very high here. 💥
📍 I'm located in the Mariana Trench.

ocean.question: I am a relationship between two marine organisms where one benefits and the other is neither helped nor harmed. What am I?

hints.text: 🤝 I'm a type of symbiosis.
Example: Barnacles on a whale. 🐳
I start with the letter 'C'.

cosmos.question: I shine bright in the night sky, and Earth travels around me. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I am very hot.
☀️ I appear every day.
🌍 Planets orbit me.

cosmos.question: I am Earth's closest neighbor, and you can sometimes see me during the day! What planet am I?

hints.text: 👩‍🚀 I'm named after a Roman goddess of love and beauty.
🔥 I am extremely hot, even hotter than Mercury!
✨ I am often called the 'Morning Star' or 'Evening Star'.

cosmos.question: I am a big ball of gas far away that glows and gives off light. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I am made mostly of hydrogen and helium.
🔭 I can be different colors.
🌌 I am born in nebulas.

cosmos.question: I am a rocky object that orbits the Sun, but I'm too small to be a planet. What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ I can be found in the asteroid belt.
👨‍🚀 Ceres is the largest one.
💥 Sometimes I can hit the Earth.

cosmos.question: I am the largest planet in our solar system. I have a big red spot. What planet am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I am made of gas.
🪐 I have many moons.
🔴 My red spot is a giant storm.

cosmos.question: I am a huge group of stars, gas, and dust held together by gravity. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I can be spiral, elliptical, or irregular.
🌌 Our solar system is part of the Milky Way.
🔭 I contain billions of stars.

cosmos.question: I am a small, icy object that, when close to the Sun, displays a visible tail. What am I?

hints.text: 🥶 I'm a 'dirty snowball'.
☄️ I originate in the Kuiper Belt or Oort Cloud.
💫 My tail always points away from the sun.

cosmos.question: I am a pattern of stars that people have named after animals, objects, or mythological characters. What am I?

hints.text: 🌃 Ursa Major is a famous example.
🔭 I help us find stars in the night sky.
✨ I look the same from Earth, but the stars are far apart in space

cosmos.question: I am a cloud of gas and dust in space, where stars are born. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I can be very colorful.
✨ New stars are formed inside me.
💥 Supernova explosions can create me.

cosmos.question: I am a point in space with gravity so strong that nothing, not even light, can escape. What am I?

hints.text: ⚫ I warp space and time.
🌌 Some form from the death of massive stars.
🕳️ I have a singularity at the center.
